main.title: PUBG
main.subtitle: Track detailed PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS stats and leaderboards

help.title: Help & FAQ
help.subtitle: Quick answers about search, seasons, favorites, and PUBG Report integration.
help.contact: If your issue is not listed, open Bug Report and describe what happened.

search.q: How do I search for a player?
search.a: Use the search field on the main page, choose platform (Steam/Xbox/PSN), and enter nickname, account ID, or profile URL.

season.a: Current season is selected by default. You can switch to previous seasons from the season dropdown on the player page.

missingStats.q: Why are season stats empty or too low?
missingStats.a: PUBG API can return limited or delayed data for some accounts/seasons. Also, requesting a wrong platform may show no stats.

avatar.a: Steam avatar requires a valid Steam API key on backend. If avatar cannot be resolved, fallback avatar is used.

reports.q: What is the PUBG Report tab?
reports.a: This tab shows encounters found via PUBG Report where kills/deaths were captured on Twitch streams.

favorites.q: How do Favorites and History work?
favorites.a: Favorites and local history are stored in your browser. Recent searched list is served from backend recent searches.

limits.q: What does Rate Limit Reached mean?
limits.a: PUBG API has request limits. When limit is reached, tracker can temporarily serve cached data until cooldown passes.

platforms.a: Steam, Xbox, and PlayStation are supported. Make sure you pick the same platform where the player actually plays.

footer.text1: Use our PUBG stats tracker to see how you perform in every match. Track kills, K/D, damage, win rate, longest kill, and more.
footer.text2: Compare your PUBG stats with friends or streamers and keep your profile up to date with your latest performance.
footer.developed: Developed by Satel for the PUBG community

words.cleanListConfirm: Are you sure to clean favorites list?
words.noFavorites: You can add players to favorites list.

cookie.text: We use cookies on our website to save searched players history, and for page Favorites. By clicking 'Accept', you consent to the use All the cookies
